title: Gazette amending scopes of Ministries published
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); An Extraordinary Gazette Notification has been issued announcing the scopes of the new Cabinet and State Ministries.
The relevant gazette notification was issued by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
According to the gazette notification, new scopes have been announced for 31 Cabinet Ministries and 39 State Ministries.
